titleStmt.title: The historie of episcopacie. [The first part.] by Theophilus Churchman.
titleStmt.author: Heylyn, Peter, 1600-1662.

notesStmt.note: Theophilus Churchman is a psuedonym for Peter Heylyn. cf. BLC.
The first and second parts each have special t.p.
Part two has imprint: London : Printed by Richard Hodgkinsonne, 1642.
The first part is located at reel 248:E.125, no. 2; the second part is located at reel 248:E.125, no. 3.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
